title: About

title: Carlos Cardona Andrade
text:
Bio
Welcome to my website! It is still under construction as you will notice while exploring other sections.
I am a PhD candidate in economics at The University of Warwick.


Education
Graduation Cap PhD in Economics, 2024 (expected) | University of Warwick
Graduation Cap MRes in Economics, 2019 | University of Warwick
Graduation Cap MA in Economics, 2016 | Universidad del Rosario
Graduation Cap BA in Economics, 2014 | Universidad del Rosario


Research interests
Development Economics | Political Economy | Economic History

title: Reconciling Weather Datasets in Africa
text:
Introduction





This is a project aiming to collect the most used weather datasets for Africa by development economist, analyze their distinctive predictive power for agricultural output and conflict, and give a recommendation about when and how to improve their use. I will update the current state of the project soon.
